Events.OnCreate:
(switch ; Only in Charon system (!= (sysGetNode) 'CP) (msnDestroy gSource)
(block ( (pirateStations (sysFindObject gSource "TA +charonPirates;")) ) (enum pirateStations theObj (msnRegisterForEvents gSource theObj)) (msnSetData gSource 'stationsLeft (count pirateStations))
(msnAddTimerEvent gSource 500 'OnTimerAttack1) (msnAddTimerEvent gSource 850 'OnTimerAttack2)
; Choose a random mission reward (msnSetData gSource 'rewardItem (randomTable 30 (itmCreate &itXRayLaserCannon; 1) 30 (itmCreate &itOmniParticleCannon; 1) 20 (itmCreate &itMarkIHowitzer; 1) 20 (itmCreate &itClass5Deflector; 1) )) ) )
Events.OnAccepted:
(block ( (korolovObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) ) ; Ignore friendly fire during attack (objSetProperty korolovObj 'ignoreFriendlyFire True)
(msnSetData gSource 'state 'underAttack) )
Events.OnInProgress:
(block ( (state (msnGetData gSource 'state)) ) (switch (and (= state 'underAttack) (= (msnGetData gSource 'targetsLeft) 0)) (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'state 'survivedAttack) (msnSetProperty gSource 'summary (msnTranslate gSource "Summary:survivedAttack"))
; We've managed to save the station so save the game (msnSetData gSource 'missionCheckpoint True) )
(= state 'strikeBack) (block Nil ; Check which stations are left for mission text (msnSetData gSource 'pirateStationsLeft (count (sysFindObject gSource "AT +charonPirates; -charonFortress;"))) (msnSetData gSource 'pirateFortressLeft (sysFindObject gSource "AT:charonFortress;")) ) ) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch ; Korolov Shipping (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (objGetProperty gSource 'ownerID) ) (block Nil ; Manual failure on owner destroyed so we can still debrief (msnFailure gSource)
; Unless the player was responsible (if (and gPlayerShip (= aOrderGiver gPlayerShip)) (msnSetProperty gSource 'isDebriefed True) ) )
; One of the missile ships attacking the station (= (objGetData aObjDestroyed 'KorolovAtCharon) (objGetID gSource)) (msnIncData gSource 'targetsLeft -1)
; One of the Charon stations (and (objHasAttribute aObjDestroyed 'charonPirates) (not (objIsShip aObjDestroyed))) (if (= (msnIncData gSource 'stationsLeft -1) 0) (msnSuccess gSource) ) )
Events.OnGlobalSystemStarted:
(switch ; If not in the right system, then nothing to do (!= (sysGetNode) 'CP) Nil
; If we've already created this mission, then nothing to do (msnFind "* +unid:&msKorolovAtCharon;;") Nil
(block ( (korolovObj (sysFindObject Nil "TAN +korolovShipping;")) (korolovPos (objGetPos korolovObj)) )
; Remove default Korolov ships and events (enum (sysFindObject korolovObj "sHZ") theShip (objDestroy theShip)) (enum (sysFindObject korolovObj "TN:32; +unid:&stSealedCargoContainer;;") theCrate (objDestroy theCrate)) (sysCancelTimerEvent korolovObj 'OnTrafficControl) (objSetEventHandler korolovObj &evKorolovAtCharon;)
; Korolov station is already damaged (objSetProperty korolovObj 'hp 250)
; Add defenders (for i 1 (rollDice 1 2) (block (theShip) (setq theShip (sysCreateShip &tbCommDefenders; korolovPos &svCorporate;)) (shpOrder theShip 'dock korolovObj) (shpOrder theShip 'guard korolovObj) ) ) (for i 1 (rollDice 1 4) (block (theShip) (setq theShip (sysCreateShip &tbCommPrivateCrafts; korolovPos &svCorporate;)) (shpOrder theShip 'dock korolovObj) (shpOrder theShip 'gateOnThreat) ) ) (for i 1 (rollDice 3 6) (block (theShip) (setq theShip (sysCreateShip &scRoninB; korolovPos &svCorporate;)) (shpOrder theShip 'patrol korolovObj 10) ) )
; Create the mission (msnCreate &msKorolovAtCharon; korolovObj) ) )
Events.OnTimerAttack2:
(block ( (korolovObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (pos (sysVectorPolarOffset korolovObj (random 0 359) 120)) )
; Create drake missile ships (for i 1 5 (block (theShip) (setq theShip (sysCreateShip &scDrake; (sysVectorPolarOffset pos (multiply i 30) 24) &svPirates;) )
(shpOrder theShip 'attack korolovObj) (shpOrder theShip 'gate)
(objSetData theShip 'KorolovAtCharon (objGetID gSource)) (msnIncData gSource 'targetsLeft) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource theShip) ) ) )
Events.OnDebriefed: (switch (msnGetProperty gSource 'isFailure) (block ( (korolovObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) theMission ) (objAddItem gPlayerShip (msnGetData gSource 'rewardItem)) (dbgoutput (msnGetData gSource 'rewardItem) (objGetName (msnGetData gSource 'rewardItem) 0x100)) (setq theMission (msnCreate &msKorolovAtCharonRevenge; korolovObj)) (if theMission (msnAccept theMission)) ) )

Language.Text:
(cat "Korolov Shipping is under attack from Charon pirates. Defend the station.

"
"System: " (sysGetName) "
" "Payment: " (fmtCurrency 'credit (msnGetData gSource 'reward)) )

(cat "You have sucessfully defending Korolov Shipping from a Charon pirate attack. " "Now you need to hunt down and destroy all Charon stations in the system.

"
"System: " (sysGetName) "
" "Payment: " (fmtCurrency 'credit (msnGetData gSource 'reward)) )

(cat "As you enter the command center, you see several people gathered around a " "central display table.\n\n"
"A woman approaches you, \"We're planning a big attack on the Charon fortress " "in this system and we could use all the help we can get. Are you...\"" )

(cat "Before she can finish, the alarms bleat and she turns back to the display table.\n\n"
"Her face goes white as she sees the mass of signals approaching the stations..." )

(cat "The command center is filled with men and women shouting orders and counter-orders. " "The constant drone of sirens is punctuated frequently by concussive blow of explosions.\n\n"
"A woman shouts at you, \"Get out of here and make yourself useful!\"" )

(cat "The command center is smashed. Some people are caring for the injured while " "others look at the tactical screens. A woman approaches you:\n\n"
"\"Thanks for your help! We were lucky that you were in the area. " "Now we need you to strike while we have the initiative. Destroy " "all the Charon stations in the system!\"" )

(cat "The command center is nearly ruined, but several people are tracking the tactical situation:\n\n"
(switch (and (not (@ gData 'fortress)) (@ gData 'oneOther)) "\"There is still one Charon station left in the system. Destroy it and you'll be done!\""
(not (@ gData 'fortress)) (cat "\"Although the Charon Fortress has been destroyed there are still " (@ gData 'pirateStationsLeft) " Charon stations in the system.\"")
(@ gData 'oneOther) "\"There are two Charon stations still active in the system: the Fortress of the Charon Pirates and another lesser Charon station.\""
(cat "\"There are " (@ gData 'pirateStationsLeft) " Charon pirate stations left, in addition to the Fortress of the Charon Pirates.\"") ) )

(cat "Everyone cheers as you enter.\n\n"
"\"We don't have much in the way of rewards, but it would be our honor if you would accept " (itmGetName (msnGetData gSource 'rewardItem) 0x040) ". The Charon pirates will no longer threaten the Commonwealth, and we owe it all to you!\"" )
